positions.title: Software Engineer
highlights: Developed and managed React microsites that interact with a Rails monolith.
Built admin tools for efficient customer data management.
Improved student engagement and accessibility while preserving annotations and analytics.
Evaluated and integrated SOC 2 security standards and a11y requirements.

positions.title: Software Engineer
highlights: Developed and maintained web apps using React, Tailwind CSS, and Java.
Maintained backend systems with AJAX, Apache Tomcat, Maven, and SQL.
Introduced an optimized production build process integrating React and Maven with Vite for hot reloading.

positions.title: Software Developer
highlights: Created a new payment processing application for banks by enhancing an existing Java monolith.
Developed RESTful API endpoints for user creation and payment processing.
